Program_Title: Clean Truck Program at Port of Houston

Headlines: Truckers who operate in the Houston area may be eligible for funding to replace their older, more polluting diesel engines. Newer, cleaner trucks mean better air quality for the region, which translates into fewer health effects from air pollution, including fewer asthma attacks, hospitalizations, deaths, and missed school days.
